intension: Create a poster for a fictional movie titled 'Dreamscape'. The movie is a blend of fantasy and reality. The poster should merge elements of a cityscape with a fantastical forest, all within a dream bubble.
globalcaption: The image features a cityscape with a large bubble in the foreground. The bubble contains a fantasy scene, which includes a mermaid and a cityscape. The mermaid is positioned towards the right side of the bubble, while the cityscape is located in the middle and towards the left side of the bubble. The scene is reminiscent of a movie poster or a graphic design.
keywords: movie, entertainment, film, cinema, cinematography, movie poster, city, urban, bridge, skyscrapers, fantasy, forest, nature, green, illustration, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a city skyline with a large, round, black circle in the foreground. The circle is positioned in the lower part of the image, and it appears to be the focal point. The city skyline is visible in the background, with a few buildings standing tall and prominent. The scene is set against a blue sky, which adds to the overall visual appeal of the image

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a woman with long hair, who appears to be a mermaid, sitting on a rock. She is surrounded by a few trees, giving the scene a natural and serene atmosphere. The woman is positioned in the center of the image, with her hair flowing down her back. The overall composition of the scene is visually appealing and captures the essence of a magical, underwater creature
